page.title: 10HOME LAUNDRY:Cont.
page.content: One takes the dirty clothes, water and soap powder,with a beating action by paddles gets the washing clean. It is removed to the second compartment where a fast revolving movement will rinse and spin out the excess water. Automatic washing machines have one drum into which the dirty washing is placed, programmed according to type of wash, wool, linen, cotton, or nylon will then wash rinse an spin damp dry. The advantage of this machine is that once programmed it can be left until the wash is complete. Spin Dryers. Hand washing is still a method commonly used. A spin dryer will rinse and spin dry only. Normally washing removed from a washing machine is hung outside on a line to dry.
